name: discord-mod-bot
author: Death Killer21
description: Moderation+ - A moderation suite built for discord moderators.

scripts.deploy:commands:guild:all: npm run deploy:commands:guild:bot1 && npm run deploy:commands:guild:bot2
scripts.deploy:commands:global:all: npm run deploy:commands:global:bot1 && npm run deploy:commands:global:bot2
scripts.clear:commands:guild:all: npm run clear:commands:guild:bot1 && npm run clear:commands:guild:bot2
scripts.clear:commands:global:all: npm run clear:commands:global:bot1 && npm run clear:commands:global:bot2
